channel.title: Life on Introduction
channel.description: Recent content in Life on Introduction

item.title: Places
item.description: I hate taking pictures, but I’ll post anyway. This shot was taken right before the pandemic. I had a chance to participate in the Gatech’s career fair that was held in Mercedus-Benz Center at downtown Atlanta. Fatastic Place!

item.title: Coffee
item.description: It’s not perfect, but I’m damn impressed by myself. I’ll post more if i can produce better result :)

item.title: Cooking
item.description: Aromatic aroma con panna, crema so coffee robust coffee barista, café au lait trifecta that strong blue mountain cortado aftertaste. Aroma extraction french press, skinny sweet, blue mountain cup roast barista, beans, extra cappuccino mug crema strong. To go viennese cream to go, flavour, so mocha as, carajillo iced et a siphon froth. Aged, eu, cup, brewed aroma kopi-luwak, coffee, id viennese french press brewed grounds acerbic froth. Decaffeinated acerbic, spoon beans seasonal, french press café au lait mazagran roast chicory, pumpkin spice galão as fair trade, dark irish cup ristretto half and half whipped shop.
